source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video shows a white tiled room with a spiral staircase leading down into a pool of water. The camera then pans to another area of the room, revealing more white tiles and some dark grey sections on the wall. There is no subject motion in this brief clip.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that there is no subject motion briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video shows a white tiled room with a spiral staircase leading down into a pool of water. The camera then pans to another area of the room, revealing more white tiles and some dark grey sections on the wall. There is no subject motion in this brief clip.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes the camera movement as a "pan" when it is a hard cut to a different scene. Additionally, the caption omits the only salient subject in the video, a small, stationary yellow object in the water at the bottom of the staircase. The description of the room's architecture is also more detailed than necessary, as the instructions state to only briefly mention the lack of motion without going into excessive detail for static scenes. The caption should be revised to accurately describe the transition as a "cut" and to focus on the lack of subject motion, while briefly acknowledging the static subject.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video opens on a spiral staircase leading down into a pool of water, where a small yellow object floats motionlessly. The scene then cuts to another static view of the white-tiled room. There is no subject motion in the clip.
